sentences.sContent: The essentials of humanistic language include talk, intonation, facial expression and gesticulation.
sentences.sContent_eng: The essentials of humanistic language include talk, intonation, facial expression and gesticulation.
sentences.sCn: 人性化服务语言要素包括语言、语调、表情和手势等。

sentences.sContent: Allusive method, use a language more commonly, also can use gesticulation, expression, or use cipher of etc of allusive sex medicaments to undertake.
sentences.sContent_eng: Allusive method, use a language more commonly, also can use gesticulation, expression, or use cipher of etc of allusive sex medicaments to undertake.
sentences.sCn: 暗示的方法，一般多采用语言，也可采用手势、表情，或采用暗示性药物及其他暗号来进行。

words.tran: 用姿势示意；（讲话时）做手势
用手势谈话；做姿势表达

remMethod.val: gest (运) + icula + tion (表示名词) → 身体的运动 → 做姿势传达
